name: BikeGenius
0:
”Alexa, open bike genius”
”Alexa, ask bike genius what's my gear ratio”
”Alexa, ask bike genius for a random fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bike genius
Developer Terms of Use
des: A hands-free resource for people who work on or simply enjoy bikes. Offers up a number of solutions for bikey-people to calculate things like gear ratios, gear inches, number of skid marks they can produce on their gearing, and other fun facts.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
